.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CheckBoxList extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl implements class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer, class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser

summary.span: 建立多重選取的核取方塊群組，其可藉著繫結控制項至資料來源而動態地被建立。

span.span: Creates a multi selection check box group that can be dynamically created by binding the control to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#Introduction) - [指定清單版面配置Specifying List Layout](#SpecifyingListLayout) - [指定清單項目Specifying List Items](#SpecifyingListItems) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項提供多重選取核取方塊群組，其會以動態方式產生資料繫結。The control provides a multi selection check box group that can be dynamically generated with data binding. 它包含含成員對應到清單中的個別項目集合。It contains an collection with members corresponding to individual items in the list. 若要判斷哪些項目會檢查，逐一查看的集合和測試屬性清單中的每個項目。To determine which items are checked, iterate through the collection and test the property of each item in the list. > [!NOTE] > 您也可以使用多個控制項。You can also use multiple controls. 控制項是用於建立使用資料繫結，而個別的核取方塊的一組更容易控制項可讓您進一步控制配置。The control is easier for creating a set of check boxes using data binding, while the individual control gives you greater control over layout. ## 指定清單版面配置Specifying List Layout 您可以指定清單的方式使用顯示和屬性。You can specify the way the list is displayed by using the and properties. 版面配置選項的相關資訊，請參閱列舉型別。For information about layout options, see the enumeration. 依預設， 會設為 `RepeatDirection.Vertical`。By default, is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`. 此屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`水平呈現清單。Setting this property to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` renders the list horizontally. 某些設定不允許水平配置。Some settings do not allow horizontal layout. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 列舉。For more information, see the enumeration. ## 指定清單項目Specifying List Items 若要指定您想要出現在項目控制、 放置`ListItem`每個項目的開頭和結尾標記之間的項目控制項。To specify items that you want to appear in the control, place a `ListItem` element for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the control. 控制項也支援資料繫結。The control also supports data binding. 若要將控制項繫結至資料來源，先建立資料來源，例如其中一個物件，其中包含要在控制項中顯示的項目。To bind the control to a data source, first create a data source, such as one of the objects, that contains the items to display in the control. 接下來，使用繫結至資料來源方法控制項。Next, use the method to bind the data source to the control. 使用和屬性，以指定的繫結至資料來源中欄位`Text`和`Value`屬性之每個清單項目在控制項中，分別。Use the and properties to specify which field in the data source to bind to the `Text` and `Value` properties of each list item in the control, respectively. 控制項現在會顯示資料來源中的資訊。The control will now display the information from the data source. 若要判斷在選取的項目控制項，逐一查看收集和測試屬性集合中每個項目。To determine the selected items in the control, iterate through the collection and test the property of each item in the collection. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to： 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191890)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191890). 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立網頁上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control on a Web page. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxList#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxList/CS/checkboxlistcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxList#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxList/VB/checkboxlistvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和初始化的新執行個體控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxListCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxListCtor/CS/checkboxlistctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxListCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxListCtor/VB/checkboxlistctorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定儲存格的框線與內容之間的距離 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance (in pixels) between the border and contents of the cell.

value.span: 儲存格的框線與內容之間的距離 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The distance (in pixels) between the border and contents of the cell.

value.span: 預設值為 -1，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is -1, which indicates this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來控制的儲存格的內容與中的儲存格的框線之間的間距控制項。Use this property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border in the control. 指定的填補量加入四個邊的儲存格的最高的資料格的高度與中最寬的資料格的寬度控制項。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell with the height of the tallest cell and width of the widest cell in the control. 產生的儲存格大小會一致地套用至所有資料格控制項。The resulting cell size is applied uniformly to all cells in the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定與邊框距離控制項是 5 像素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the cell padding for the control is 5 pixels. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，並可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 每個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxListCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxListCellPadding/CS/checkboxlistcellpaddingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxListCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxListCellPadding/VB/checkboxlistcellpaddingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來控制中的個別儲存格之間的間距控制項。Use this property to control the spacing between individual cells in the control. 這個屬性會套用垂直和水平。This property is applied both vertically and horizontally. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的儲存格間距控制項是 5 像素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the cell spacing for the control is 5 pixels. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，並可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 每個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 建立樣式物件，這個物件是由 控制項在內部使用，以實作所有的樣式相關屬性。

span.span: Creates a style object that is used internally by the control to implement all style related properties.
A that contains the style properties of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要是由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自類別。The method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中自訂的伺服器控制項，以便一律會傳回的新執行個體類別控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always returns a new instance of the class for the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要是由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自類別。The method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 樣式屬性控制項適用於所有清單項目包含的控制項。The style attribute for the control applies to all list items that are contained by the control. 使用屬性來檢查或設定用於控制項和其清單項目之樣式屬性。Use the property of the to examine or set the style attribute for the control and its list items.

span.span: if the state of the is different from the last posting; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要是由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自類別。The method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 方法會指出是否狀態控制項已變更。The method indicates whether the state of the control has changed. 換句話說，它會判斷是否在控制項中的每個清單項目具有相同的與最後張貼的值的值。In other words, it determines whether each list item in the control has the same value as the last posted value. 使用者選取或清除控制項變更中的項目對應的屬性值物件存放至集合控制項。A user selecting or clearing an item in the control changes the property value for the corresponding object in the collection of the control. 如果在控制項中，選取相同的清單項目或已停用，傳回`false`。If the same list items are selected in the control, or if the is disabled, returns `false`. 當方法會傳回`true`控制項，網頁架構會叫用控制項的方法。When the method returns `true` for a control, the page framework invokes the method for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要是由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自類別。The method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 方法可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 方法會執行任何預先呈現的必要步驟，在儲存檢視狀態和轉譯內容之前。The method performs any necessary prerendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content for the . 中所包含的個別清單項目控制項初始化為使用目前的轉譯， ，和值。The individual list items contained in the control are initialized for rendering using the current , , and values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中自訂的伺服器控制項，以便一律會傳回的新執行個體類別。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always returns a new instance of the class for the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCheckBoxListOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCheckBoxListOnPreRender/CS/custom_checkboxlist_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCheckBoxListOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCheckBoxListOnPreRender/VB/custom_checkboxlist_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCheckBoxListOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCheckBoxListOnPreRender/CS/custom_checkboxlist_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCheckBoxListOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCheckBoxListOnPreRender/VB/custom_checkboxlist_onprerender.vb#2)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要是由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自類別。The method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 這個網頁架構會呼叫方法負責控制何時方法表示已變更的清單項目狀態中控制項。The page framework calls the method on a control when the method indicates that the state of the list items have changed in the control. 方法呼叫方法，以引發事件。The method calls the method to raise the event. 控制項開發人員可以覆寫方法來執行自訂處理，當使用者選取或清除清單控制項中的項目。Control developers can override the method to perform custom processing when the user selects or clears list items in the control. 方法可以選擇性地執行之前引發驗證控制項事件。The method can optionally perform validation before raising the event for the control. 若要驗證時清單內的項目頁面上的控制項群組的選取時，設定和屬性，以`true`，並指定可驗證的控制項群組的屬性。To validate a group of controls on the page when a list item within the is selected, set the and properties to `true`, and specify the group of controls to validate in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自類別。This method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 實作控制呼叫方法，後者接著會採用方法以呈現個別的核取方塊的清單項目。The implementation for a control calls the method, which in turn uses the method to render individual checkbox list items. 方法控制項會忽略`itemType`和`repeatInfo`參數。The method for a control ignores the `itemType` and `repeatInfo` parameters. `repeatIndex`值會用來選取的核取方塊清單項目集合，並選取的清單項目呈現至輸出資料流。The `repeatIndex` value is used to select the checkbox list item in the collection, and the selected list item is rendered to the output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為，您可以使用這個屬性來指定在顯示的資料行數目控制項。When the property is set to , you can use this property to specify the number of columns that display in the control. 如果未設定這個屬性，控制項會顯示單一資料行中的所有清單項目。If this property is not set, the control displays all list items in a single column. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性可指定兩個資料行，會顯示在控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that two columns are displayed in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，並可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 每個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxListRepeatColumns#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxListRepeatColumns/CS/checkboxlistrepeatcolumnscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxListRepeatColumns#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxListRepeatColumns/VB/checkboxlistrepeatcolumnsvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The number of columns is set to a negative value.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示要垂直或水平顯示這個控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control displays vertically or horizontally.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此屬性指定的顯示方向控制項。Use this property to specify the display direction of the control. > [!NOTE] > 顯示資料行的數目一律由屬性。The number of columns that are displayed is always determined by the property. 如果這個屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Vertical`如果屬性設定為，從上到下，再下一個資料行，依此類推直到所有的項目會呈現填滿第一個資料行。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical` and if the property is set to , the first column is filled from top to bottom, then the next column, and so on until all items are rendered. 例如，如果屬性設定為`3`中的項目控制會顯示在三個資料行，如下列表格所示。For example, if the property is set to `3`, the items in the control are displayed in three columns, as in the following table. |||| |-|-|-| |11|44|77| |22|55|88| |33|66|99| 如果這個屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`如果屬性設定為，從上到下，再下一個資料行，依此類推直到所有的項目會呈現填滿第一個資料行。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` and if the property is set to , the first column is filled from top to bottom, then the next column, and so on until all items are rendered. 例如，如果屬性設定為`3`的項目在下表中的三個項目每個，資料列中顯示控制項。For example, if the property is set to `3`, the items of the control are displayed in rows of three items each, as in the following table. |||| |-|-|-| |11|22|33| |44|55|66| |77|88|99| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性，以指定的顯示方向是垂直。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to specify that the display direction is vertical. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，並可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 每個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxListRepeatDirection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxListRepeatDirection/CS/checkboxlistrepeatdirectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxListRepeatDirection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxListRepeatDirection/VB/checkboxlistrepeatdirectionvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您應該使用方法來處理張貼的資料物件。Typically, you should use the method to process posted data for a object. 方法是明確介面成員實作。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定義處理張貼的資料的自訂實作物件，請覆寫成員。

para.span: 明確介面實作會呼叫處理控制項的張貼的資料的方法。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the method to process the posted data for the control.

MemberSignature.Value: void IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent ();
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent() cil managed
Sub RaisePostDataChangedEvent () Implements IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent
virtual void System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent() = System::Web::UI::IPostBackDataHandler::RaisePostDataChangedEvent;

summary.span: 當控制項的張貼資料變更時引發。

span.span: Raised when posted data for a control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您應該使用方法來引發事件時的張貼的資料物件變更。Typically, you should use the method to raise an event when the posted data for a object changes. 方法是明確介面成員實作。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定義引發的事件的自訂實作物件，請覆寫成員。

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign TextAlign { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign TextAlign
Public Overridable Property TextAlign As TextAlign
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::TextAlign TextAlign { System::Web::UI::WebControls::TextAlign get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::TextAlign value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定群組中核取方塊的文字對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the text alignment for the check boxes within the group.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定相關聯的核取方塊的文字是否顯示在左邊或右邊的核取方塊。Use this property to specify whether the text associated with the check boxes appears on the left or right of the check box. 如果這個屬性設定為`TextAlign.Right`，右邊的核取方塊會顯示文字。If this property is set to `TextAlign.Right`, the text is displayed to the right of the check box. 如果這個屬性設定為`TextAlign.Left`，左邊的核取方塊會顯示文字。If this property is set to `TextAlign.Left`, the text is displayed to the left of the check box. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性可指定相關聯的核取方塊的文字會出現在右邊控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the text associated with the check boxes appears on the right side of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，並可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 每個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CheckBoxList.CellPadding Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxListTextAlign#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxListTextAlign/CS/checkboxlisttextaligncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxListTextAlign#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxListTextAlign/VB/checkboxlisttextalignvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的標籤文字對齊不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The specified label text alignment is not one of the values.
